titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey a certain parcel of land located near the city of Barstow, California.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

bill.summary: 6/26/1987--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the city of Barstow, California, specified lands for public park and recreational purposes, including the building of a public amphitheater. Retains a right of reversion to the United States should such land not be so used or if construction of the amphitheater has not begun within five years.
